name: OSSC API
description: This is a self hosted, unofficial, privacy first, OSSC API that provides an easy to use API for your HSD OSSC grades.

FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_BASE64.description: A BASE64 encoded string of your firestore admin credentials .json file. Follow the instructions inside the repos README file.

SENTRY_DSN.description: The Sentry DSN for your project. This is used to report errors to Sentry. This is optional.
